title: Rogers Lag
body:
NA server with Rogers Canada (Toronto). other games i play are fine, discord/skype is ok. its just for league like wtf.

Pings spike about once a game for 1-2 minute and i have to quit and reconnect

Also, in game it shows 26ish ping but it feels like 200, i play ezreal and lee jg so this is very annoying.

plz let us know when it would b fixed so we can keep playing your game.

I lost 2-3 in my promos to diamond two times cuz of this.

replies.body: We did receive word that Rogers ISP is having some issues with League! Unfortunately this is out of control and it's best to reach out to Rogers to look into exactly what's going on.
hey man me too :)! when will this be fixed????

I have been noticing quite a fair bit of packet loss around the boards today, and it seems like most of it is happening due to something going wrong with the backbone for many different ISP's. 

Let's go ahead and run a quick scan on your network logs from that game using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to be certain that this is packet loss as well. Take a screenshot and post it here for me to see!
